titleNullable: Crisis Resolutions Dataset + Good Ways Model Pure
subtitleNullable: Crisis Resolutions Centered Q&A + Good Ways Model Pure Ontology Embedded
descriptionNullable:
This dataset contains 2,463 questions and answers in the form of prompts and completions about crisis resolutions. It is based on the Good Ways Model, which is a very small but nevertheless very powerful refined tool for fine-tuning and training in general of Crisis-Resolutions-Oriented Agents (Whether People or Machines).

The Good Ways Model may also be found separately through its own dedicated Dataset:
https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/korompilias/good-ways-model-pure-ontology-qa

## **About the Center**

The Center of Crisis Resolutions is an organization promoting Good Ways without biased prejudgements and through AI-enhanced gamified simulations focused on good governance for individuals and professionals.

## **About the Good Ways Model**

The Good Ways Model is a unique model implemented by Crisis Resolutions to promote good governance through good practices. It incorporates gamification elements to increase participation and foster a sense of community among members. The model consists of eight levels of Good Ways and their respective sets, with 205 indices defining the totality of human cognition (Pure Ontology).

The model is based on commonalities found in ontological, phenomenological, and epistemological research across various cultures and time periods. The goal is to encourage members to incorporate the principles of good governance into their daily lives and contribute to positive change in their communities.

More info: https://crisisresolutions.com/
